home.title: Dashboard
home.description: Binner is an inventory management app for makers, hobbyists and professionals.

lowInventory.title: Low Inventory
lowInventory.description: Use this page to reorder parts you are low on.<1/>You can define a custom <3>Low Stock</3> value per part in your inventory.

header.title: Bill of Materials
header.description: Manage your BOM by creating PCB(s) and adding your parts.

bom.notEnoughPartsToProducePcb: You do not have enough parts to produce this PCB.
bom.notEnoughPartsToProduceBom: You do not have enough parts to produce your entire BOM.
bom.noPartsAssigned: Assign parts to get a count of how many times you can produce this PCB.
bom.pcbProduceCount: You can produce this PCB {{count}} times with your current inventory.
bom.bomProduceCount: You can produce your entire BOM {{count}} times with your current inventory.

header.description:
Bill of Materials, or BOM allows you to manage inventory quantities per project. You can reduce quantities for each PCB you produce, check which parts you need to buy more of and analyze costs.

Choose or create the project to manage BOM for.

partTypes.title: Part Types
partTypes.description: Part Types allow you to separate your parts by type. <1>Parent</1> types allow for unlimited part type hierarchy.<3 />For example: OpAmps may be a sub-type of IC's, so OpAmp's parent type is IC.

exportData.title: Import/Export Data
exportData.description: Import or Export your Binner database to a human-readable format.
exportData.uploadNote: Drag a document to upload, or click to select files

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Binner includes a suite of free utilities common to daily life in electrical engineering.

barcodeScanner.title: Barcode Scanner
barcodeScanner.description: Test your barcode scanner to see what values it outputs.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your integrations, printer configuration, as well as label part templates. <1 /> Additional help can be found on the <3>Wiki</3>

confirm.mustAuthenticate: External Api is requesting that you authenticate first. You will be redirected back after authenticating with the external provider.

settings.integrationsDescription: To integrate with DigiKey, Mouser, Arrow or Octopart/Nexar API's you must obtain API keys for each service you wish to use. <1 /> Adding integrations will greatly enhance your experience.
settings.swarmDescription: Swarm is a free API service provided by <1>Binner's cloud service</1> that contains part metadata from many aggregate sources. It is the primary source of part, media and datasheet information. Registering for your own API Keys will give you higher request limits and can be obtained at <3>https://binner.io/swarm</3>
settings.printerConfigDescription: Configure your printer name as it shows up in your environment (Windows Printers or CUPS Printer Name)
settings.partLabelTemplateDescription: Part labels are printed according to this template.

orderImport.title: Order Import
orderImport.enterOrderNumber: Enter your order number for the supplier.
orderImport.instructions: For <1>DigiKey</1> orders, this is the <3>Sales Order #</3>.<4 />For <6>Mouser</6> orders, this is the <8>Web Order #</8>.<10 />For <12>Arrow</12> orders, this is the <14>Order Number</14>.
orderImport.mouserNote: <0>Note:</0> Mouser only supports Web Order # so make sure when importing that you are using the Web Order # and <2>not the Sales Order #</2>
orderImport.arrowNote: <0>Note:</0> Arrow requires that you first request access to their Order API by sending them an email. See <2>Arrow Order Api</2>

popup.lowStock: Quantities below this value will indicate the part is low on stock.
popup.quantity: The quantity of parts currently in stock.

confirm.deletePart: Are you sure you want to delete part {{partNumber}}?

message.noChildPartTypes: There are no child part types.

confirm.deleteProject: Are you sure you want to delete this project and your entire BOM?
confirm.removeBomParts: Are you sure you want to remove these <1>{{quantity}}</1> part(s) from your BOM?
confirm.deletePartType: Are you sure you want to delete part type <1>{{name}}</1>?
confirm.permanent: This action is <1>permanent and cannot be recovered</1>.

error.failedToRemoveBomParts: Failed to remove parts from BOM!
error.failedClearedCredentials: Failed to clear cached credentials for {{apiName}}
error.invalidOrder: Hmmm, that doesn't look like a valid order number!
error.invalid2dBarcode: Hmmm, I don't recognize that 2D barcode!

bom.addPart: Add a part to the BOM
bom.removePart: Remove selected parts from the BOM
bom.addPcb: Add a PCB to this project
bom.producePcb: Reduce inventory quantities when a PCB is assembled
bom.filterOutOfStock: Select to only show out of stock parts
bom.pcb: Indicates which PCB your part is assigned to. A PCB assignment is optional, all unassigned parts will appear in the <1>All</1> tab.
bom.quantity: The quantity of parts required for a single PCB
bom.inventoryQuantity: The quantity of parts currently in inventory
bom.referenceId: Your custom <1 />reference Id(s) you can use for identifying this part.
bom.schematicReferenceId: Your custom <1 />schematic reference Id(s) that identify the part on the PCB silkscreen. <3/>Examples: <5>D1</5>, <7>C2</7>, <9>Q1</9>
bom.displayAll: Displays all parts including parts not associated with a PCB.
bom.unassociatedPartName: Edit the name of your unassociated <1 /> part
bom.quantityAvailable: Edit the quantity available in your <1 />inventory
bom.editReferenceId: Edit your custom <1 />reference Id(s) you can use for identifying this part.
bom.editSchematicReferenceId: Edit your custom <1 />schematic reference Id(s) that identify the part on the PCB silkscreen. <3 />Examples: <5>D1</5>, <7>C2</7>, <9>Q1</9>

versionBanner.newVersion: A new version of Binner <1>{{version}}</1> is available!
